channel.title: Dragon Claws Special Attack
channel.description:
I Need Some Help With this.
I Want it to be [b]JUST[/b] like the dragon dagger special. I know the Gfx code is 252 For the Spec But where do i put it? How do i add the special to the wepon? and i wanted to add better bonuses for it, i also need some help with that.
Thanks For looking, Master Monk

item.title: Dragon Claws Special Attack
item.dc:creator: @i0wnuall i0wnuall
item.description:
@i0wnuall wrote:

You’re going to have to look through all your coding to find the Dragon Dagger Special, BUT you can go to other websites (hint hint) because i’ve seen them there.
Moparscape isn’t the most fast with tutorials.
Good luck.

Read full topic
